text: one of the most important things we've done to make our operations succeed is learning the different species of grass and learning to rotate to favor those species that are desirable to you one of the things that people misunderstand about rotational grazing is they think it's going to take a big investment in fencing and time and labor and that's not the case the thing that surprised me most when we changed the way we were grazing is how much more carrying capacity our Ranch had compared to before
